parameter.name: alexademo2_dbEntities-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: alexademo2_dbEntities Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: metadata=res://*/PluralsightDataModel.csdl|res://*/PluralsightDataModel.ssdl|res://*/PluralsightDataModel.msl;provider=System.Data.SqlClient;provider connection string="data source=YOUR-DATABASE-URL-HERE;initial catalog=alexademo2_db;persist security info=True;user id=YOUR-USER-NAME-HERE;password=YOUR-PASSWORD-HERE;MultipleActiveResultSets=True;App=EntityFramework"

parameter.name: DefaultConnection-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: DefaultConnection Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
